mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.state FROM device as a,lamp as b where a.type="lamp" and a.id=b.deviceId
SELECT a.*,b.state,b.coverPercent FROM device as a,window as b where a.type="window" and a.id=b.deviceId
SELECT a.*,b.state,b.coverPercent FROM device as a,curtain as b where a.type="curtain" and a.id=b.deviceId
SELECT a.*,b.state FROM device as a,smokedetector as b where a.type="smokeDetector" and a.id=b.deviceId
SELECT a.*,b.state,b.settingTemperature FROM device as a,airconditioning as b where a.type="airConditioning" and a.id=b.deviceId
SELECT a.*,b.state,b.lazyNum FROM device as a,camera as b where a.type="camera" and a.id=b.deviceId
